full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNAM PAR SGO GSUM GYI RNAM PAR BZHAG PA LEGS BSHAD RGYA MTSO RBA RLABS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): AA CHI THU NO MON HAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B CES RNAM THAR SGO GSUM GYI RNAM PAR BZHAG PA LEGS BSHAD RGYA MTSO'I RBA RLABS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SNGA SOR DPAL LDAN 'BRAS SPUNGS SU DON GNYER CAN 'GA' @010A *, ,ZHIG GIS BSKUL NGOR CUNG ZAD BRIS PA'I THOG , THOS BSAM GLING GI GZHUNG GSAR 'DZIN GRA'I DGE 'DUN RNAMS NAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS TSUL GYI BSKUL MA BYUNG BAR BRTEN, ,KUN MKHYEN BLA MA'I LEGS BSHAD BEE d'URYA DKAR PO'I GAN MDZOD KYI KHA SKONGS SU DMIGS TE, CHOS SMRA BA'I BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES RANG LO NYER BDUN PA LA CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG, 'JAM MGON BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO PHYOGS DUS KUN DU RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,RIGS LAM DRII MED TSA ZER GYIS, ,'GRO BLO'I MUN PA KUN SEL BA, ,MKHAS RNAM DGA' BYED RTA BDUN BDAG ,MCHOD SBYIN SPAR GYI LHA LAM NGOS, ,'CHAR BYED RGYU SBYOR DAD STOBS LDAN, ,BLO BZANG LEGS LDAN LA SOGS PA'I, ,'GRO KUN MA RIGS MUN PA LAS, ,RGYAL TE THAR PA'I GRONG MCHOG TU, ,RING MIN STOBS BCU'I RGYAL BA CHER, ,MKHOD TE 'GRO KUN SGROL BA LA, ,MI PHAM MGON DANG 'JAM DBYANGS KYI, ,RNAM THAR BDAG GIR BYED PAR SHOG , ,,CES SGO MANG GRA RIGS HA RA CHEN JA SAG GUNG GI GSHOGS RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG LEGS LDAN NAS SPAR GYI SBYAR BYANG DGOS TSUL LTAR, ,` RA SGRING AA CHI THU NO MON HAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
